t: Handmade Area Rugs: Persian, Vintage, Oriental, Modern & Traditional | ECARPETGALLERY
s: At ECARPETGALLERY, we seek to balance centuries-old craftsmanship with the precision of woven works of functional art. All our rugs are 100% handmade and one-of-a-kind embracing fairly traded practices through our artisan partnerships.

ECARPETGALLERY is a respected retailer that sources timeless, hand-woven rugs from all over the world. We believe a room layered with natural textures, organic colors and dynamic design can spark memories, inspire and elevate everyday life.
